HttpClient.select_all_files: SELECT id, name, type, id_directory, modified, created FROM files
HttpClient.select_modified_files: SELECT id, name, type, id_directory, modified, created FROM files WHERE modified > :date
HttpClient.select_modified_files_informations: SELECT id_file FROM files_informations WHERE modified > :date
HttpClient.select_deleted_files: SELECT id FROM deleted WHERE table=files AND :date > date
HttpClient.select_deleted_files_informations: SELECT id FROM deleted WHERE table=files_informations AND :date > date
HttpClient.select_all_accounts: SELECT id, name, password FROM accounts
